Tucson slowly moves through the tunnels to avoid dangerous movement.  With =
Dark Hawk in towe he hopes not to endanger him any further.

" Did it ever =
occur to you Perceptor, that he doesn't belong to the Predacons in the firs=
t place?  That's right, before Hydras took him away, he was one of ours.  A=
 Maximal.  And he will always be a Maximal.  And his name is actually Windl=
ord. Remember that Perceptor, remember that."

His voice gets colder and an=
 air of annoyance rolls over him.  His optics narrow and it would appear th=
at his patience with Perceptor was running thin.  Yet he was guiding them o=
ut so he had to keep his cool, no matter how hard it was for him.

" So if =
anyone should be highly upset about everyhing, it really should be Lord Eld=
er, Rodimus Prime and myself.  Your leader is the one who took our comrades=
 away from us.  He should have expected some form of revolt".

Night Shift =
chimes in.

"Yeah, just because your own lackies ain't good enough, doesn't=
 mean ya can pluck from our side of the fence and turn our comrades inta yo=
ur merry men!  That's one lesson Hydras ain't learned yet.  Hmmm, he must r=
eally have a brain the size of a turbo rat's head!"

Tucson listens to Nigh=
t Shift.

" Shh...  Easy..  Your temper is going to give us away."

Night S=
hift stops his rambling.

"Yeah, you're right, my bad, sorry."
